title: Katia the Wind Runner
subtitle: Digital Piece
alt: woman with blue eyes and hair holding a blue shining sword blade in front of her face, there are also two light figures in front of her near the sword
description:
2021 

Katia is based on the Wind Runner's from Brandon Sanderson's Stormlight Archives. She has 2 spren which is unconventional in the book but I really liked the idea of. I'm a really big fan of his books and really enjoyed creating this piece.
